chart.name: chart.total.hours.per.day.timesheet.imputed.on.manufacturing.order
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.duration) AS _duration, self.manufOrder.manufOrderSeq AS _manuf_order, self.date AS _day FROM TimesheetLine self WHERE self.timesheet.id= :timesheet_id GROUP BY self.date, self.manufOrder.manufOrderSeq ORDER BY self.date
